name: Energy Cycle
summary: 'Energy Cycle' – new puzzle game from the developers of ‘Energy Balance’. When you click each cell on the game field - it changes color, and the colors of adjacent cells horizontally and vertically. Your task to bring all the cells to the same color. Sounds pretty easy, but try to do it!
info:
• 中文名: 能量循环
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年1月13日
  • 售价: $0.99/$2.99
  • 官方网站: http://www.sometimesyou.com/
